name: linindsv
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, clininds, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))

stmt.origin: jca(wbr(c0, clininds, c1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, clininds, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
-| wi(wbr(c0, clininds, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(wbr(c0, clininds, c1), wcel(c1, universe))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[linIndS]c1 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
⊣ (c0[linIndS]c1 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (c0[linIndS]c1 → c1 ∈ 𝕌)

-| wi(wbr(c0, clininds, c1), wcel(c1, universe))

⊢ (c0[linIndS]c1 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
⊣ (c0[linIndS]c1 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (c0[linIndS]c1 → c1 ∈ 𝕌)

comment: The classes of the module and its linearly independent subsets are sets. (Contributed by AV, 13-Apr-2019.)
